messages.message:
Hey team,

I chatted with @Sayan and it looks like this bug from Fridays bug-bash  (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/AUTO-373?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiNjQwYmE4ZmMxYWYxNDEzMTgxZDJiODcyYTM1MjZlMGQiLCJwIjoiaiJ9)is a backend issue. Its happening on apps with and without case fields.


Seeing this response, for `projects/app/<id>/sample_input/?expect-node-type=folder`

```{
    "message": "Folder Applications/Deployed/All/3289e896-74e5-4525-83c5-8da7f04bbc2a/sample_input does not exist: <nil>"
}```
and this in the browser console

```Error: Could not get solution: Error occurred executing GRPC method: Request /repo_service.RepoService/UpdateDeployedSolution failed. Error code=INTERNAL, Error=(13, 'internal'), Message: Solution could not be updated. Non-retriable error```

I reprod this, this is the request:
https://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com/api/v2/zero-shot-idp/projects/app/def420d2-0999-4ac2[â€¦]e-a7ecd36cb8b4/sample_input/?expect-node-type=folder (https://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com/api/v2/zero-shot-idp/projects/app/def420d2-0999-4ac2-ba3e-a7ecd36cb8b4/sample_input/?expect-node-type=folder)
I think we should look into it but the sample file include still works so I'm guessing we're fetching the wrong url to verify the sample input files
fetching the wrong url from the frontend?
I am thinking that's the case but i'd need to look into it
